title: Coastal Hyatt Escape in the Heart of Xiamen with Infinity Pool
description:
Escape to this oceanfront oasis on Xiamen Island, where coastal calm meets the pulse of city life. Hyatt Centric Ocean Front Xiamen places you nearby beaches and the buzzing energy of Zeng Cuo An food street, offering the perfect launchpad to explore the island’s rich synergy of culture, cuisine and natural beauty.

Unwind with a dip in the infinity pool overlooking the South China Sea, or find your rhythm in the House of Music, a laid-back lounge with vinyl records and nibbles. Savour sustainably sourced Fujian cuisine and local seafood at Alley 36, then stroll to iconic landmarks like the UNESCO-listed Gulangyu Island or visit Zhongshan Road to satisfy your shopping desires.
offer_address: 36 Tianquan Road, Siming District, Xiamen 361005, China

title: China Harbourside Sky-High Elegance in Xiamen with Outdoor Pool & Two Onsite Eateries
description:
Discover the charm of Xiamen at this sophisticated urban retreat, located by the picturesque Wuyuan Bay. Positioned in the Wuyuanwan business district of Huli, this hotel is the perfect base to experience the city’s island allure and cosmopolitan buzz.

Stay active with the onsite fitness centre, relax in the spacious outdoor pool and explore the nearby waterfront parks, cultural landmarks and lively markets. Satisfy your appetite with a range of international and Asian dishes at Market Café or savour authentic Cantonese cuisine at Xiang.
offer_address: No. 5 Ri Yuan Er Li Road, Huli District, Xiamen 361006, China

title: China: Xiamen Lakeview Stay only Minutes from the Sea
description: In the heart of the Haicang District, Hotel Indigo Xiamen Haicang, an IHG Hotel, is a sophisticated sanctuary only minutes from the South China Sea. Journey to Gulangyu Island to admire heritage architecture and picturesque views, take a soothing stroll around nearby Haicang Lake or indulge in a spot of retail therapy at nearby Aluohai City Plaza. On your return, connect with guests at the MeSpace Social Area or savour seasonal seafood fused with Fujian flavours at the onsite restaurant.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Xiamen Haicang, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.18, 2nd North Binhu Road, Haicang District, Xiamen, Fujian 361026, China

title: Stylish Xiamen Island Break with Infinity Pool and Sea Views
description: Surrounded by historic landmarks, lush gardens and the shining waters of the South China Sea, InterContinental Xiamen, an IHG Hotel, offers guests the perfect base to explore the region’s many coastal charms. Savour exquisite South Fujian cuisine at Cai Feng Lou, enjoy aperitifs and DJ-spun tunes at Azure Bar, laze by the hotel’s spectacular infinity pool or wander the island’s countless perfect beaches, each beautiful beyond compare.
offer_address: No.19 Lingshiguan Road, Siming District, Xiamen, Fujian 361008, China

title: Central Xiamen Elegance with Rooftop Pool, Restaurant & Wine Bar
description:
Enjoy the bustling port city of Xiamen from a luxurious base, perfectly positioned in the heart of this walkable city. This five-star retreat offers sleek facilities including a state-of-the-art fitness centre and a rooftop pool offering panoramic city views.

Savour local and international cuisine at the hotel's market-to-table restaurant, or enjoy a drink at the stylish wine bar. Beyond the hotel, explore the bustling Zhongshan Road, brimming with shops and eateries, or visit the historic Gulangyu Island, a UNESCO World Heritage site.
offer_address: 101 Hubin E Road, Siming District, Xiamen, Fujian, 361004, China

title: Xiamen China Stay with Sparkling Water Views
description: A luxurious space for both business and pleasure, Crowne Plaza Xiamen Jimei Seaview, an IHG Hotel, exceeds all expectations. Located a stone’s throw from the famed Xiamen Horticulture Expo Garden and hosting a variety of fine dining venues and relaxation spots, this destination is about more than just business. Enjoy Asian delicacies at JOY All Day Dining, or unwind with afternoon tea or a cocktail with stunning sea views at the top-floor ROOF 22 Restaurant & Bar.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Xiamen Jimei Seaview, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 866 Xingbin Road, Jimei District, Xiamen 361000, China

title: Sophisticated China Retreat with Harbour & Island Views
description: Escape to China’s glowing and sophisticated city with a stay at Hotel Indigo Xiamen Harbour, an IHG Hotel - located in the heart of this stunning seaside metropolis. Discover the cosmopolitan allure of the city as you wander past the European-inspired architecture and the seaside promenade. Take a night cruise and witness the glow of neon lights reflecting off the harbour, or spend your evenings dancing the night away at one of the many nearby bars.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Xiamen Harbour, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.16 Lujiang Road, Siming District, Xiamen, Fujian 361001, China
